name: pixi_ui
description: Port of pixi_ui to typescript and PIXI v6

scripts.start: npm run build:prod && npm run devServer --open-target index.html
scripts.example: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack index.html
scripts.example1: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack popup.html
scripts.example2: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack popupmenu.html
scripts.example3: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack app.html
scripts.example4: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack message.html
scripts.example5: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack modal.html
scripts.example6: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack theme.html
scripts.example7: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack progress.html
scripts.example8: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack badge.html
scripts.example9: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack button.html
scripts.example10: npm run build:dev && npm run devServerPack buttongroup.html
scripts.xpretest: echo npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.coverage: echo npm run pretest && nyc floss --path=test && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.coverage:ci: echo npm run pretest && nyc floss --path=test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
scripts.xtypes:default: echo mkdirp dist/types && jsdoc -c types/jsdoc.conf.json && node types/assemble pixi.js
scripts.pretest: echo 'pretest. not running: npm run build:dev'
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && COMPARE_ORIGINAL=true mochapack --mode development --require test/pixi-setup.js test/src/*.ts test/src/*/*.ts
scripts.testNC: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && mochapack --mode development --require test/pixi-setup.js test/src/*.ts test/src/*/*.ts
scripts.startTest: npm run build:dev && COMPARE_ORIGINAL=true mochapack --watch --mode development --require test/pixi-setup.js test/*.ts test/*/*.ts
scripts.predist: npm run build:prod && npm run test
scripts.postdist: echo copyfiles -f bundles/*/dist/* dist && copyfiles -f "packages/**/dist/*" dist/packages
scripts.prerelease: echo npm run clean:build && npm test

author: John Talbot
